com.airg.android.device

Class Cameras

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.airg.android.device.Cameras

  • public class Cameras
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some common camera-related queries.

    • Method Detail

      • hasAny

        public static boolean hasAny(android.content.Context context)
        Does the current device has any camera(s)?
        Parameters:
        context - active context
        Returns:
        true if the device has a camera (front or rear) and false otherwise

      • hasFront

        public static boolean hasFront(android.content.Context context)
        Does the current device have a front facing (aka 'Selfie') camera?
        Parameters:
        context - active context
        Returns:
        true if the device has a front facing camera and false otherwise

      • hasFlash

        public static boolean hasFlash(android.content.Context context)
        Does this device's camera have a flash
        Parameters:
        context - active context
        Returns:
        true if the camera has a flash and false otherwise

      • hasAutoFocus

        public static boolean hasAutoFocus(android.content.Context context)
        Does the camera have auto-focus?
        Parameters:
        context - active context
        Returns:
        true if the camera is able to auto-focus and false otherwise.

      • supportsRaw

        public static boolean supportsRaw(android.content.Context context)
        Does this device support raw (unprocessed sensor output) photos
        Parameters:
        context - active context
        Returns:
        true if the device supports raw formats, false otherwise.
